com.philips.pins.shinelib

Interface SHNDevice

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SHNDeviceImpl

    public interface SHNDevice
    SHNDevice is a representation of a peripheral inside BlueLib.

    This interface provides a means to connect and disconnect to the peripheral. State updates can be received through the SHNDeviceListener interface. To receive updates an instance of the listener has to be registered with the SHNDevice instance.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  SHNDevice.DiscoveryListener
      Interface that provides updates on Services and Characteristics discovered on the SHNDevice.
      static interface  SHNDevice.SHNDeviceListener
      Interface that provides updates for connection state changes of the SHNDevice.
      static class  SHNDevice.State
      Possible states of the peripheral.

      • connect

        void connect()
        Provides a means to connect to the peripheral. The bluetooth connection is performed once.

        Callbacks about state changes are provided via a registered SHNDeviceListener instance.

      • connect

        void connect(long connectTimeOut)
        Provides a means to connect to the peripheral with a connect time out. The connect time out is the maximal amount of time to establish a bluetooth GATT connection. At least one attempt to connect will be performed. In case of a connection failure within the time out a retry will be issued.

        Callbacks about state changes are provided via a registered SHNDeviceListener instance. The time out does not guaranty the callback after the time has elapsed. It has impact only on establishing the GATT connection. As soon as the connection is established the onStateUpdate is called. Increasing the time out time improves the chances to get a successful connection. On certain phones the time out of 120 seconds increases the connection reliability.

        Parameters:
        connectTimeOut - the time out for bluetooth GATT connection time in MS.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Provides a means to disconnect from the peripheral.

        Callbacks about state changes are provided via registered SHNDeviceListener instance.

      • readRSSI

        void readRSSI()
        Reads the RSSI of a connected peripheral

      • getCapabilityForType

        @Deprecated
SHNCapability getCapabilityForType(SHNCapabilityType type)
        Deprecated. use getCapability(Class)
        Returns a SHNCapability instance for the type.

        The returned instance is not type strong. The API user needs to cast it to the proper class type.

        Parameters:
        type - A requested capability type SHNCapabilityType
        Returns:
        a SHNCapability instance for the type, null if not supported.

      • getCapability

        <T extends SHNCapability> T getCapability(Class<T> type)
        Returns the SHNCapability for the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Template to prevent casting
        Parameters:
        type - Type of capability requested
        Returns:
        Properly typed capability
